Package toystore.financial

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Currency
    Used to describe a currency, with a name(RON, EUR), symbol($, Â£), and parity relative to EURO (GBP has 1.1 parity because a GBP is worth 1.1 EURO).
    Discount
    Used to describe a discount, with a name, type (either fixed discount: "-10 RON", or percentage one: "-15% BLACK FRIDAY"), value, and date of appliance, which is initially null and later change to current date.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DiscountType
    Enumeration of all possible discount types
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CannotChangeParityException
    Checked exception, is caused by Currency's method changeParity, thrown when, for example euro's parity is change relative to itself(1 euro can be only worth 1 euro, nothing less or more)
    CurrencyNotFoundException
    Checked exception, thrown when trying to change Store's field currency with a value that is not in the map with all currencies from Currency.
    DiscountNotFoundException
    Checked exception, thrown when trying to apply a Discount that is not yet added in the map with all of the discounts.
    NegativePriceException
    Checked exception used when applying a discount to a product and it's price becomes negative.
